content: This app is so buggy that when using it, I have to apply insect repellent to my phone. One main issue is the list tray at the bottom of the screen, which is a great concept, if it worked correctly. When it does show itself, most of the time it's blank. Changing the list only last a minute or so, then randomly changes to another list & constantly changes my default list. As big of a company as Amazon is, you would think that they could afford to pay someone to fix the issues.

I used to be able to click on the picture for whatever I was looking at to zoom in. Now it just shows a white screen when I click on one. I've also started noticing that some questions are completely irrelevant to the product I'm looking at. For example, looked at a posture corrector and there were questions related to a pump on a Craftsman tool and then other questions about a table. I've been seeing this one other items too. Just seems so weird.

This app has gotten horrible, I make a list so I can drag my stuff to it and when i come to see the list has changed to another one, then I look for the one I had put in the first place and it doesnt load, so i have to close the app completely, open it back up, put the list there again and look up everything AGAIN!!!! It happens every 5 min or so, to damn annoying!!!!! Im so dissapointed. I love shopping amazon but this has made me cut down on the shopping.

Amazon Shopping used to have an older app before they swapped over to this one and I swear the older model was more reliable. Ever since I had to upgrade to this one, it frequently crashes and freezes. Even though they stopped supporting the old one, I may try switching back to that one again instead since I never had a problem with it. This app does it's job when it works.

I'm not sure if or how this app is superior to simply using a mobile browser. I was trying to manage my ebooks. This involves pop ups. On mobile?! Pop ups? Really? The pop ups are very slow to load (I'm on home Wi-Fi) and extend beyond my phone screen (original pixel). In order to update my ebook, I have to click on a button off screen. So, basically useless. Uninstall time.

I do buy stuff from amazon but your stupid app gave no option to opt out of prime or clicking out of it by forcing me to be signed up. I thought I can by pass it by clicking past the ad when it was a sign up sheet. I was hoping to keep that free trial to test out when I really needed it. But no! Instead of respecting the customer's needs you force them to sign up so they would pay out of pocket for a monthly fee of two day shipping after the trial when they might not buy that much every month.

The app used to be really good. However, I've recently been getting constant - and I mean CONSTANT - crashes. I can't even even go 4 links deep into the app without the screen going randomly black and white, with severe unresponsiveness. I've tried contacting support with my issue, but their Twitter support page says to contact their email, and despite several email reports, I've recieved dead air. I am now forced to use a Web browser to make purchases and manage my account.

It's been all good with me, there is a lot to choose from, I am happy with the quality, it's easy to locate item's and easy to go through the ordering process. I been pretty happy with the shipping, my orders have show up on the time frame Amazon says it will if not before. The shipping packaging has always been great to keep thing' fro getting damage. I only had one item come in broken and it was a cell phone case, and it wasn't due to packaging because it had penty of protection.

The app is performing poorly compared to the chrome and web version. A lot of features like "Add to List" and "Add to cart" NEVER respond but the Amazon home page does. As a result I cant add anything to my cart for days now or even save the items to my list for later after browsing. Hope you guys fix this app issue, I have the new s10 too and it's been going on for a little over 1 week now.

Serious problem when I have to uninstall the app just to read a product description. The mobile site and app are very bad at showing all the information for a product. I prefer to shop on their website with desktop mode enabled so I can actually see all relevant info. Clicking a link in the browser was forcing the page to open in the Amazon app itself which meant I kept getting limited info on my screen. I had to uninstall the app just so I could view the entire product info and reviews.

If I was able to give you a plethora of negative stars, I'd do it. There's already a pre-installed version, so why do I need another? I had purchased an item on Amazon, paid for the 3 to 5 day shipping, and I didn't get the item until 6 WEEKS later (they sold out but never mentioned on site), was enrolled in monthly subscription for that item, but nothing was mentioned. You treat your warehouse employees like literal slaves, with management forcing them to work overtime. Don't want this app!

Nothing is more frustrating than the lists on this app. Constantly, my lists keep getting mixed up. I put things on one list and next thing I know, everything is doubled onto another list which is a pain when there is more than one person on the other list so they see it and think things have been added that shouldnt have been. This bug is frustrating!!!

Not any issue with the app and highly recommend Amazon for most online buying and selling compared to eBay. Had many BAD experiences with ebay making a purchase of one item and being charged for a different item with a much larger price in a different country from the seller I made the purchases from but the issues were resolved in 48 hours by eBay since I had screenshots everytime and pictures with my back up phone as proof and still received the items quite a bit later due to issue.

Love Amazon, but so frustrated everytime they do an upgrade it messes up the Giveaway feed. You start at the top of the giveaways and then if your half way down the page and enter for something if you don't win and press the back button to go to where you were, it doesn't go back to that spot. It goes all the way to the top of the page again!!! So you have to keep scrolling all the way down to where you were everytime after you enter something, that is major frustrating!!!

I never had a problem with this app until 2 months ago (so, an extra star for years of good service). The last 2 months or so... the app crashes and says, "we're sorry" and shows me sad pics of dogs. I called customer service and they were at a loss. I have cleared cache, uninstalled and reinstalled. I have had it with the app. Fix it!!!

If I could leave a big fat ZERO, I would. joined Amazon Prime and nearly takes an act of God to cancel the subscription, completely ridiculous. Needed to make some financial changes in my life, every penny counts but canceling Amazon was one of the most difficult & ridiculous process I've ever encountered. Poor customer service all around. WOW! HAPPY TO BE DONE WITH THIS ONLINE TRAP!

Glitchy as heck. It never remembers my list trays, it has misleading prices constantly, like where it will say "from $8.99" but when you click on it, not a single option is $8.99. Instead it's twice or triple the price. Prime isn't really a thing anymore. Some actually arrive in 2 days. A lot more often the item takes 3 or more days to even leave the warehouse. Very misleading. And you can't comment on reviews using the app or downvote irrelevant reviews. The old app worked better than this one.

It's okay. My largest problem with this is it doesn't have an option to put your name on packages (specifically for Amazon pickup orders not orders sent to your house). I share my prime account with my family, so it'd be really great if the option existed. The old app has this option. It'd be nice if it made it onto the Amazon Shopping app too.

For the several years that I have been a Prime Member. I have been extremely satisfied with all aspects, from searching to purchasing to deliveries, to returns/refunds and customer service. Appreciate the prompt manner in which any issues have been resolved. Also thankful for their reasonable pricing when compared to other apps. Highly recommend. Haven't upgraded to new version due to negative reviews. Will update after I am forced to and use it.

I love Amazon but the shopping app seems to be getting buggier and buggier...a few months back it started going black and sometimes crashing when I checked reviews and customer photos. I've gotten every update in hopes that it would be fixed, but now it happens every single time. So frustrating! I'll stick with the browser site for now.

keeps crashing, have deleted cache, memory and deleted the app completely only to reload and have it continue to do the same thing. Tired off seeing dogs with an error message that says uh ooh something is wrong on our end return to home page only to go to home page and it continues to show the error message. Have contacted customer service only to be told to uninstalled and reinstall. the mobile app is junk. IT needs to read the reviews!!!!!!

I've been a Prime member and app user for many years. Amazon simply gives the best consumer experience ever. They've raised the bar a mile above all competition. I love the product reviews. I love tracking a product leaving California one day and somehow getting delivered to me the next in Michigan. This company has completely spoiled us. And despite the bad "big company" box others love to put them in, they've done it on the smallest profit margins possible. They give the consumer pure value!

functionally the app is supposed to offer a lot. Many features work inconsistently. The lists aren't displaying in order or updating with Amazon. i can't delete it edit them from the app either. Not because it's not available, because when you try it doesn't work.

review for the APP not amazon itself. the app has been irritating me lately, click one item and opens up something totaly unrelated. ( my screen is perfectly fine no cracks, no other app i have does this. so its a bug). ill also add stuff to my cart and then it will disapear. or say unavailable. put its available when i use Amazon on my desktop.

During a 26 minute phone call with customer service, they insisted that my only option is to create a new email address for the account that I would like to keep, since my true email address is attached to the other account (which I have never used.) It is ridiculous to insist that I create a new email. Amazon should be able to merge the two accounts. They will not. I came up with my own solution. Changed email to an incorrect address, freeing correct email to be attached to correct account.

I love amazon but not this app, it's always lagging and crashing or loading blank pages then taking me back to the home screen while I'm browsing items and what sucks is when that happens, I can't seem to find my way back to the items I was last comparing. I'm better off just using the site itself there's really no difference between the two.

I keep getting a white screen when I find a good item and it gets stuck. also Amazon promoting their Prime products is blocking the market for everyone else I'm trying to find something to specific and Amazon keeps throwing other things in there that I'm not looking for I type in the word long sleeve I shouldn't see cups and dishes just because I say from lowest to high prices

I have used Amazon for years. All items have been delivered on time excellent conditional. Worth the value. If I click by mistake customer support always deal with things totally effectively. Brilliant bargains. I love the Kindle books, DVD's and many other goods. when I type what I need in the easy to use search bar straight away lots of bargains from high to low Amazon are brilliant.

I absolutely love using Amazon shopping! Fast, convenient, and has good selections. And offers some free shipping on select items. Having coupons would be more beneficial. Or order so much, save some kind of a deal. Especially when one might order a lot. I have Amazon Prime, but it offers no discounts for my membership. Only disappointment.

I am usually on Amazon weekly, if not daily. my only issue is the freezing in the app itself, when I try to remove or put an item in save for later it will show loading, then kicks me back with an error message. it does this continuously to the point of frustration. that is my only issue.

i think I'm addicted to Amazon... there are pretty good deals on Amazon but i noticed recently that they allow anyone to sell items through them. 3 out of 5 of my recent orders got messed up. and Amazon usually doesn't make up for it right away, if at all so you'll have to deal with the seller. Also, the shipping carrier Amazon has, sucks, they rarely deliver on time, two day shipping turns into an -up to- six day, shipping. but that's on the company, not the app, the app is fine so far

Worst customer service imaginable! I have purchased alot of items over the past few years and had Prime and don't believe I have had to speak to someone before. I bought 4 solar lights and only two worked which I found out after I had installed them. I contacted customer service and spoke to Anush. He was a sarcastic person and said only thing I can do is return them for a refund (knowing full well I have already installed two!) Never again using Amazon.

no stars. i installed and updated it immediatly since I had just signed up for account and opted in on 30day free trial for Prime. was finishing the options and settings and of course security when a notice popped up and informed me that my less than 1 hr old Amazon/Amazon Prime account I spent so much time verifying codes for security, and had already been informed I was granted my new prime membership, had now been locked and my prime membership was cancelled.

I am increasingly frustrated with Amazon. I am a long-time subscriber to their Subscribe and Save program. It's a wonderful program that allows me to schedule monthly shipments of all my consumable items. But Amazon keeps REMOVING my regular items from S&S in an attempt to FORCE their Prime Pantry and Prime Fresh programs on me. I'M NOT FALLING FOR IT. I may even reconsider where I get all my monthly consumables if they keep taking my products away as part of some perverse marketing scheme!

While it is very convenient, very often, when going deeper into the app, the screen will show a dog under which it would say, "Uh oh. Something went wrong at our end." It happens way too often. more often than not. It occurs when I tap the screen for further looking into a product that's when I see this happen. It should not be happening so often.

Bug report: when placing an order and changing shipping to free, it takes a few minutes to actually change it. The animation loops for a few minutes and it feels as if the app hanged. Please fix. Otherwise app works great.

I payed to try the one day delivere on (amazon prime) and it was the worst experience ever. I place an order and it was delivered on the wrong adress. Later I re-oder my item and the delivery truck couldnt enter to deliver the package "due to missing imformation" which was provided before hand. I talk to customer service like four times and they said that I was going to receive the package later the same day and it wasn't true. I never got my package! so is not worth paying for prime.

Like it well enough, but feel like it tracks me much more, which is creepy. Can't use Amazon smile??? Researched, & you have to use full website for charity. Hmph! 4/15/19 update pages fail to load, cart won't load. pages are blank. please fix this version! have to force close app, relaunch frequently, just to see a page. Discouraging me from shopping at all.

For being such a big company Amazon sure does suck at making apps. The functions fine. does everything you expect out of it. However, the design and use of animations are just simply outdated. The app also freezes frequently even on flagship phones.

Overall, Love the app but, I put a lot of things in my cart and can't keep track of witch one goes with what. (I get like 30+ ideas for a lot of things) So, want I was thinking was, there would be a save button (kinda like the cart button) But, you can put them into separate carts so you don't lose track of witch one is witch.

I use this a lot and did like it but now keep getting a message to install new one as this wont be supported soon. It IS the new one..very annoying makes me get off the site much quicker now. 3 months later and this has just gone from bad to worse? The items aren't in a list now they are much larger photos so take longer to scroll thru. You cant see options at a glance .Its slower. Its not an improvement. I shop a lot on here and recently have not been happy with the quality of some items.

Terrible. The app confirms purchases that are not placed. I have tried twice now to purchase an item on special and have the app indicate all is well, only to discover the orders are not placed (after the price goes back up.) Amazon is unable to assist with these issues. Don't shop through the app!

since the new update ... its glitchy.. it doesnt put things in the correct lists, keeps saying its saved and then when i check, it isnt there. ive uninstalled and re-installed, signed in and out and still its not working correctly and its only since the new update. needs another update or i will be deleting as ive had this app for years without issue.

Does not have certain basic features such as a digital library which were specifically promised in the customer support section of the website. While the app is likely better in a vacuum than 1 star, it doesnt have what I need for a mobile app and seems to exist solely for coercing customers into impulse purchases. I deleted it for my own benefit.

Amazon is great but their app is terrible. Constantly freezing or just not loading. It's very slow, to the point of seeming unresponsive. It is possible that this is due to a recent update, because this app was not always like this.

I don't understand why this app has started showing me lots of items that can't even be shipped to my country, even though it's set to ship to my specific address, or items that can only be imported for fees as high as the cost of the products. I have to click through so many useless things. I may as well just use the Canadian Amazon website on my phone because this app is no longer useful to me.

Amazon it's just amazing overall, the app works perfectly and the customer service in the app is really simple to use. There's one thing i would recommend and is that we should be able to access the invoice of our orders directly fron the app, apart from that everything is just great.

I really like this app. It has categories for your orders, past orders, browsing history, etc. Items can be searched easily with photos, descriptions and ratings. I've had very little trouble with this app.
Buggy and half-assed. Pages don't load reliably, only about half of the time will the images enlarge when you click on them, and there's no tabbed browsing. It's just terribly conceived.
can't look at full size images. I have no problem looking at full size images their website but the app will not support it. Just a gray wheel spinning for hours on end if you let it.

app is always stalling. especially when I want to look at a photo of a product. I have to tap on the photo at least 10 times or more before it opens. It is the only app I use that always is malfunctioning.

Amazon embodies shopping for the stay at home human. Options are limitless and avaiablility is unmatched. This app is a great tool on the go, in the bed or even in the shower. Shopping at your finger tips üëç

latest update sucks they took the watching deals option away so now I can't locate any of the deals I was watching also any notifications that come up don't even take me to the deal that it's notifying me about. if y'all can't make it better and keep the things people like don't mess with it!

no issue with APP just amazon, guaranteed delivery doesn't always happen and they refund you the cost of delivery unless you are a prime member in which they offer you a $5 promo to your account. also, the customer services asked me to be patienced 6 times from 6 different people. i found this to be quite annoying and no resolution was found as I didn't habe time to keep this discussion going.
The tray at the bottom keeps resetting. All of the items I drag into it to compare disappear. I've uninstalled/reinstalled, and cleared the data in the app, but it still doesn't work. Samsung S9plus

I bought two books. One a digital one and the other a hard cover copy. My card was charged but no books. Customer service never got back to me and left me hanging online. Not very impressed with my first ever purchase through Amazon. It sure as hell will be my last one too.

No problems ever. Even won a cool item in the "Daily Giveaways" like the fourth day i tried to win something. it truly was free. I received item I won quickly, no cost & no strings attached. Daily Giveaways are just that-FREE Giveaways!! Also, I really like the vast movie selection I get on the Prime Video app. I get that with my Amazon Prime membership. It's worth every penny.

When this product arrived it looked like it had been thrown off a Semi Truck, it was dented all up bent legs and metal, the top had huge dent in it I would attach pictures but I don"t know how. I would think with a product this expensive that would of shipped it differently.

Very intrusive. I disabled every permission I could find yet whenever I try to view an item on amazon with my browser the app detects it somehow, opens itself, and takes over the browser which makes it very cumbersome to try to shop the way I like

Everytime I order from the app it charges me extra out of nowhere. Once I ordered a game to my mate and it hadn't informed me that it had hooked my to prime and made me pay for it. Another time I bought a present for my mum and when I got to the checkout it said 8.99 including shipping etc. I buy it then check my account and its taken 2 separate payments adding to around 11.00. Not using the app until this is fixed.

honestly Amazon is not anymore thr online saller it used to be twice they messed up, one never my item was delivered I send several messages they never resolve the problem. the other one they sent wrong item never resolved. actually im shopping at Walmart Target same day pick up my item in my close store great shopping.

Recently updated to latest version from a year old build, due to all orders through the app forcing me to use the reward balance from my Amazon card on every purchase. Issue is still not fixed. We'll see what how much more intrusive this latest version is.

it really sucks that I work for a company to where we have Amazon prime and I order things that we need in the two-day shipping used to be perfect to where it came UPS or FedEx but now they use these carriers and then they take all day to bring your item and I end up having to either order for someone else to where I can get it quicker or just take a loss and wait the next day to serve my customer this stuff really sucks Amazon!!!!!

Terrible service, even when I pay for Prime, my deliveries are constantly/repeatedly rescheduled days later. They've even been completely lost because the deliverers didnt follow my instructions! Experienced various problems with Amazon..

This website needs an overhaul to update its options, prices, user interface(access), and efficiency. Had I not known better I may shop here, but eBay, or even Google search, offers a more desired result. I mean, it could be worse, but this is 2019, right?

I ordered two books from Amazon. One a digital one and one a hard copy. My card was charged for the purchase. No books. Customer service left me hanging online with no reply. I am not impressed with my first ever purchase through Amazon. It sure as hell will be my last.

this is for the shipping not for the app. the app it self is quite organized and deliverirs come in good condition but it takes two to four weeks for an order to come against to 3 to 7 days promise. I find this very annoying and a problem Amazon should fix

While looking at Today's Deals, product images disappear as I scroll down. If I keep scrolling, images of different items will reappear. If I want to see those items where the product images disappeared, I would have to click each item.

Any kindle book I want to buy is suddenly unavailable, so what's the point of the app and kindle. Used to like the fact that you could get everything that you want on amazon but now it's annoying with regions and markets just like apple. Bye bye Amazon.

I have been a loyalcustomer of Amazons for years and recently ordered a TV from them which stated next day delivery if order by a certain time. I ordered by said time and as soon as I had ordered it the date changed from Saturday to Wednesday and when asking about the issue they made out I was a liar, yet I was not asking for a refund. I could have brought the same TV from Currys for the same price and had it the same day but where I have been loyal to Amazon I ordered from them. Very poor!

Very easy app to get around! The shopping experience is extermely enjoyable as well. Great reviews on the products you are considering and I love getting to make my custom wish lists. This app literally does EVERYTHING!
Absolutely abysmal experience. Long delays after button presses, often leading to no response. Overall slow and unresponsive. No option to use the old Amazon app which worked fine.

If you live in Asia, forget it. Most of the movies and TV series are region block. I plan to pay monthly then as I try the free trial. Most the TV series and movie are block. So such a shame and I lost ¬£1 for a free trial for amazon prime.. I don't get why charge me ¬£1 for a free trial.. Such a rip off. üò°

Some features broken (edit review), will sometimes force ads and promoted items full screen depending on what you do. Very limited search filters for things like clothing. Better off using a browser version.

Good quality product, however, it doesn't fit on the standard shower head holder. This means its awkward when using as it won't sit in the holder, also awkward when you have finished using it as there is no place to hang it up!
Had to reinstall after last update. A system like tabs would be nice so when browsing products have both the products page open, to compare. Other than that, no issues.

won't properly sync with my actual account which means I may be paying for two amazon primes using the same email address, while still not getting the benefits it promises. Will have to uninstall after trying to cancel prime.

worst app, shopping list favorites are tgere one second gine the next works one day not the next. you spend endless time searching for something, add them to favorites too review later for purchase and there gone. one day they show up at the bottom next hour they don't. just a mess

Wish list haven't been working recently, when I'm searching though items and I find one I want to save, it only let's me have my "default wishlist" open. Even if I try to change it, it just sits there and loads forever. Really irritating üòë

Nothing free about the shipping unless you buy amazon prime. They'll lie to you up until you make a purchase about their "free shipping" until the checkout when you select your methods of shipping and the cost... must have forgot what free meant I guess.

Persistent crashes upon opening the app. Can't change delivery address even though payment was still not made and the item haven't been shipped out? Disappointing. Won't be shopping with Amazon again.

uninstalled the app since it spys on me, Alexa is proven to listen to you. just use a browser link now. and since Amazon is not the best price online, I hunt for deals. Also the app doesn't give you best prices and deals, it steers you to the Amazon products. Don't be fooled, they are not the best place to buy.

Am being forced to download this app if I wish to continue to shop with Amazon.Check the permissions,they are nothing short of intrusive.App needs access to far more of my personal info than is comfortable,access to my contacts,my photos...Just about everything on my phone.Disgusting breach of privacy.

Amazon has the worse customer service I have ever had to deal with. I asked customer service to cancel a old account I had because I got a new one through Metro By T-MOBILE. The customer service guy told me he cancelled my account. I create a new one with Metro by T-Mobile. the next month my bank account gets overdraft by Amazon from my old account. It took them months to stop charging me and cancel my account and to get my money back. Done be next !!!

What thr hell is wrong with Amazon these days? The app keeps freezing and when I open Amazon on through chrome it does the same thing. I can't get all the content for my Kindle to load. I've uninstalled and reinstalled. Nothing works.

I really hate companies and people who steal. and Amazon is a thief. I was about to play e a order for a screen protector but I paused for a minute to take a shower. while I was in the shower I received 3 text from 1 of my bank card saying Amazon was trying to make a purchase for the screen protector without me checking out. I'm glad I transferred my money to another bank account. I really dislike THIEVES. I will spread the word for people to use a different site to buy things.üñïüñïüñïüñïüñï

Internal error- have been trying to sign in to purchase things yet there's been an internal error for days. I've tried making a new account via email and phone. txt was never received from amazon and kept getting error messages when signing up via email.

I use this app nearly all the time, along with my Amazon Echo Dot and Amazon Unlimited Music. You have to live under a rock to not know what Amazon is, especially how you can buy anything on there. love it so much.

Why is the app always running in the background? Ie when I press the Overview button to see the list of apps live on my phone then the Amazon app disappears from the view and when I reenter from the app drawer then it is where I left off.

I use this app a lot, but when I would like to just browse lists such as, today's deals, the item preview pictures in the list go blank about ten or fifteen items down. This only happens on my galaxy note 9, not my iPad Air.

Good for notifications, bad for buying stuff. "Uh oh, something went wrong" is the only product you'll see in the app. Better off using the mobile website. However notifications work fine, so thats a positive.

i don't know what is happening with this app but everytime i log in and i don't log out of my app and when i return to the amazon website i have the login again and i always have to keep login in. This has never happened before. it's really annoying.

Worst support and service. When claimed for promised Warranty, I was shocked by Irresponsible Response from a company like Amazon. I have been buying from Amazon for last 3 years. but when there was an issue with my purchased product and claimed my warranty, i had an extremely bad experience from Amazon and their support team. Never again from Amazon india.

Probably my most used App. Latest updated version is glitching on my Samsung Galaxy S8 Active which is why I'm not able to give it a full 5 stars. Never had it glitch so much before the latest updated version...

I love this product and usually buy it in store. I am giving 2 stars because the bottle was thrown in the box with another item and did not have a cap. It makes me wary if the contents because it was not sealed.

horrible custmer service took a second payment out 10 days after they took the payment and is trying to blame the bank for it! Wont be ordering from them again the guy on the phone told me to go through my bank and wont refund the second payment that they took that wasnt authorized and i hadnt ordered anything else!

its so kool a very easy app i also have a amazon fire tablet and ive been using computer's for over 25 years first i wirjed on customized software for medical billing , collexting and transcribing. so i wasnt very impressed wgen the internet blew up to me it was trashy and xheap and most times unethical. it was absolutely impossible to go directly to a specific point as i was used ti doing.lol. vut this is years later and finally i am satisfied with amazons straight forwardness and Amazo honestly

Very disappointed we have been paying prime for years now and suddenly items are just not eligible to be delivered to PR. And now suddenly the price of the only thing and reason we have prime membership went drastically up. I'll be considering discontinuing my prime membership if I cant get this resolved.

Was great til yesterday... What the heck did Amazon do to the app? The daily deals are all messed up now.. What is the point of the notifications for the daily deals now.. The notification no longer brings you to the deal you were watching, u expect customers to scroll through the hundreds of items everytime? Please please restore it.

Once again i installed this app after it was updated and it began attacking functions on my device and spam calling me.. my own app spam calling me with every permission disabled.. You and the digital advertisers base you are allowing to leverage your app are handing google customers over to exploitation and criminal scamming. You need to fix this app. The digital advertisers are neferious and it is being leveraged to attack consumers. Im also going to write amazon and google directly .
Its the website in more compact and sometimes more convinient form! Never had issues / bugs or any of the sort. Runs smoothly and updates frequently.
A required new app on top of a bloatware one I can't uninstall. Thanks. Keep the bloatware or make it removable. Have phone providers update the bloatware one or make both usable.

Go to ebay. Amazon has decided to start shipping their own packages. They marked my package as delivered days before i got it and when i asked about it I was told to ask my neighbors and look around the other propeties around my house. When they finally delivered it they delivered it the the community office and not my house. Very annoying and on top of that if you haven't spent $50 in the past 12 months you can't leave reviews. This means that I am not seeing a lot of reviews as well.
When viewing a product the app states it will ship to my area, but when i go in to purchase, the app says it doesn't ship to my area. Makes filtering based on shipping pointless.

I have no problems with this app or the company. if my package doesn't arrive on time they usually give me my shipping back (if there was any) or give me some kind of discount. I have prime so usually I get free shipping.

These packets are excellent in keeping the house free of ants once the initial attack has been diminished. Experience tells me these are good for at least a year. Of course the best is "all natural" to avoid animal & bird...& human toxicity. gin
